website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Ideapad 100S has the best keyboard we've seen on a low-budget laptop, and more than enough battery life to get through day, but a dated touchpad holds it back.
pros: The Lenovo 100S has a colorful, fingerprint-resistant shell, a great keyboard and excellent battery life
cons: Without a touchscreen, the outdated touchpad is even more frustrating
It will slow down under moderate workloads, and the low-resolution screen is as basic as it gets

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic construction -- fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I had thought this was such a good deal, but I guess you get what you pay for. Wave had it just over one year, and the plastic case is breaking apart in several places. within a few months of owning it the frame around the display started to separate from the the display, and now the hinge is broken and the whole thing is coming apart (see photo) so it will have to be replaced. It is not used heavily, and it never leaves the house, so this is not from undue wear and tear; it is because the plastic construction of the case is cheap. One year is too short of a lifetime for a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: ReadsOnPlanes

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is incredible
customer_reviews.text: I got this as last Christmas for my daughter. I was a little concerned before buying that the processing power might not be enough. Well I was wrong. She plays Netflix and YouTube on it ALL THE TIME. She also uses the Office 365. The physical size is super slim and light weight. She racks up about 8 hours of screen time per week. It's been an incredible device, especially at this price point. One of the best tech purchases I've every made.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mays

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 11 months, then keyboard died
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this laptop for its light weight, perfect for running presentations. But after 11 months, the letter D and the lower row of keys completely stopped functioning. Had to use an external keyboard (and change my startup password to avoid the letters zxcvbnm). But it was so cheap, I just bought another laptop. Great if you just need a cheap, low-used travel laptop for a few months. But don't depend on it for long term or heavy duty. All in all, worth the price...until it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Danarama

customer_reviews.title: Guess I got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Oh. I like the size and the ease of using it, but I have to admit that it has technically given me performance problems since I received it. First of all, it was shipped with a virus/malware already installed. I have difficulty streaming things on sites like hulu and netflix and twice I have had to deal with the clock slowing down from the actual time. Plus the space bar sticks about a third of the time so I often have to go back and retype things. While these are issues I can work around for now, if it died tomorrow, I would not be replacing it with another Lenovo IdeaPad.
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: Good secondary laptop
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine for browsing the internet, streaming movies, and occasionally backing up photos from my phone. It does this well. I recommend buying a high capacity microSD card to augment its storage. Pros- Thin, lightweight, has an HDMI out, couple USBs, bluetooth, and an SD card reader. Decent screen. Great browsing/media-streaming machine. Cons- Its got a glorified cell phone processor in it, so don't imagine you're going to play videogames on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Bhardwaj

customer_reviews.title: The battery lasts 10 hours in a row!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got it for me to used at college, and it was exactly what I needed! I never used a case and got minor scratches only! It can be a bit slow at times, but for college is perfect, in my case I used it to write papers, do HW and use excel. To me, there is not need to have expensive computer at least for finance major :)
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice small laptop to get things done on the cheap, you get what you pay for but in this segment you will not find anything that is better than this one with win 10 on this price range. The one star dropped is for 1080p videos support, it seems that Intel cant figure out a way to make there Atom processors and low end processors in general handle 1080p video playback which is a huge surprise as my android tablet from 2014 can with a very weak ARM processor. Simply put If you are a gaming person and a productive person that multitask this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Aly

customer_reviews.title: lenovo ideapad
customer_reviews.text: this laptop is so lightweight and cute. it's definitely just for small tasks, not everyday work use. i only use it when i travel or when i'm sitting on the couch just reading or even watching something online. for the price, you really can't beat it. i bought a different 'tablet' with keyboard a while ago for twice the price and hate it. this one is so much better - it's actually lighter, it's faster, and it's just an all around better product. my only grip is that it sometimes is a bit slow when loading web pages, but it's not so slow that it makes me dislike the laptop overall.
customer_reviews.author: t.a.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great. It's easy to carry around because it doesn't weigh much. It's the perfect size for taking to class. It took a few days for the 1 year of Microsoft to actually work. The only problem is when the charger breaks, it's difficult to find a replacement that will actually work for less than $35. Considering how inexpensive the laptop is, I thought the charger would be cheaper. And don't try universal chargers... They don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product ... waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop just about 3 years ago in hopes i would be getting a good quality and long last product but sometime last year the system crashed. I had someone take a look at it and reset it but it was no use. I know have to look fot another product as this one is no longer able to be used as it has a mind if its own and freezes, presses keys i never pressed and deletes files. Unless i receive some assistance i really don't think i will be repurchasing this lenovo brand again, my laptop is useless.
customer_reviews.author: laurell lovell

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for school. Fits great on my desk and in my lap on the sofa. I do all sorts of projects for school using it and am impressed at all that it can do. Definitely a smart buy for students looking to save a buck!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie1983

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother wasting your money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a lightweight laptop to mainly read emails and take to meetings. After just over 6 months of very light use, the screen developed that cracked screen look, although plugging it into the TV I could see the screen. I thought about purchasing a new screen, but at $40, I don't want to sink any more money into it. I guess I can continue to use it as a laptop connected to the TV. Also- battery life, even when in sleep mode or turned off is not very long. The cord is pretty short, so you need to be pretty close to a plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: The Keyboard is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard sucks. The screen is tiny. It moves slow even after you’ve installed a 64GB SD card. Trackpad sucks too. I attached an external mouse and keyboard for my son to use it. He just wanted it for the color.
customer_reviews.author: Ronzo

customer_reviews.title: Overall: great product and even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Perfect for travel. I'm able to get my work done on it and then I'm able to relax with games, entertainment and social media easily. Awesome battery life and super durable. Only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is the fact that the speakers could have a little more to them, storage space and the super delicate touch-pad that sometimes will cut through something I'm type or completely erase it.
customer_reviews.author: Rev_Trevin

customer_reviews.title: Performance is as expected for a laptop with these specs One problem that's sort of annoying is that the space bar is pretty inc
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight, keyboard doesn't feel cramped for the size of the laptop, battery lasts for a LONG time. Performance is as expected for a laptop with these specs One problem that's sort of annoying is that the space bar is pretty inconsistent. Sometimes I have to hit it pretty hard for it to definitely accept the input, which is frustrating when writing a lot
customer_reviews.author: Kate K

customer_reviews.title: I have used it to download pictures and andwatch videos as well
customer_reviews.text: This computer has worked out so well for me. I bought it for the purpose to continue my online class while I traveled abroad. I have been able to type up my work and send it in without a problem. I have used it to download pictures and and watch videos as well. Because I understand it has limited capacity I have not attempted to overload it with any complicated software. I never planned on using it much beyond traveling, but I have found myself using it more as a convenience. It is a very useful little laptop at an amazing price. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop served much more than promised, the only con would be the quality. It's very fragile, and slipped off the side of the couch. Now half the screen isn't there. I now hook it up through the TV, where I can use the PC part of the computer. I use the computer as a tuning device holder for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: the screen resolution and graphics are poor and difficult to see
customer_reviews.text: IAfter opening and setting up laptop, the battery would die within minutes (less than 10). Even after charging for a few hours, the battery would die within minutes if not plugged in. Finally, after 4 times of use the computer would not work without constantly being plugged in to power. After around 10 uses, the laptop will not take a charge and cannot be used. This is a brand new laptop and the battery life that was advertised is not working. Furthermore, the screen resolution and graphics are poor and difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN CLARKE

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable from Day One
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! Not only is the computer flimsy and almost inoperable, but Lenovo customer support is a joke. In the months I've had this device, I've never gotten it to work properly, and have wasted hours and hours dealing with customer support. Most recently, the support agent told me that the warranty is expired, since I bought the computer 8 months ago. I've already sent it in for servicing and gotten it back, and it seems that no matter what I do, it's just doomed. And don't believe the report that it offers a tablet function--it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Tamira

customer_reviews.title: a nice device because of its size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Theoretically, a nice device because of its size and weight. Screen is fine, but speed is bad and connection to cloud (on which it is very dependent) is unreliable. A real disappointment. We really should have returned it within Amazon's return window, as it now it sits abandoned in a drawer (we don't want to inflict it somebody else by selling on Craigslist).
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat a $150 laptop. This is great for casual web browsing. It is ideal for someone who doesn't really like the idea of touch screens on tablets and needs a tactile keyboard. It runs Windows 10 and Office. Perfect portable laptop to have around the house and take on trips.
customer_reviews.author: kang0r0o

customer_reviews.title: Think seriously before purchasing?
customer_reviews.text: Had to order.memory card.immediately. Still not enough memory for ordinary day.. Not bad for the money, but might rethink and.get regular laptop. Battery doesn:t hold charge for two hours when in use. So slow loading and kdyboard is spastic, always sticking when trying to space!
customer_reviews.author: M Lind

customer_reviews.title: How can you beat a 100 dollar computer?
customer_reviews.text: Good computer for the price. I did not like the red though so I bought a wrap for the front. Looks a lot better now.
customer_reviews.author: Only the Best

customer_reviews.title: this is a fantastic deal I bought two and both are excellent for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a fantastic deal I bought two and both are excellent for office work Old IBM bought by Lenovo but still has the excellent keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook, but wish I would of shopped around ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first, but have constant issues with using wifi. My iPad works just fine on the same network but this thing just don't. It loses signal constantly
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for a while, then magically died one day, of course after the warranty and support had ended. Run far away from this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: cd1515

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier. Its no super computer but it does everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. Its no super computer but it does everything the average computer needs to do. It has office 365 installed for 1 year and surfs internet well too. The battery life is outstanding! The 180 degrees folding is amazing, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size and weight and the keyboatd is very easy to use. I use a wireless mouse with it. And it is really cute.....and red! It comes with Windows 10 installed and a year's free subscription to MS Office 365. Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Do not hessitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great notepad. Bought it for my wife while she went to school. She is technology challenged so I needed something easy to use and tough. Let me just say I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: matthew fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ultraportable Windows Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! So happy I did not purchase a Chromebook. Looks really awesome with the red too, many compliments @ the coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: DJKAHUNA

customer_reviews.title: super light good battery life
customer_reviews.text: can't beat the price on this. If this thing ever quits me, I'll not hesitate to buy another one. It makes no noise (no spinning harddrive or cooling fans). super light good battery life. plenty fast enough watch netflix and shop on the internet. (about the only thing i use a home computer for)
customer_reviews.author: richard bomgardner

customer_reviews.title: 7 months later and issues
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a great laptop for minimal use. After 7 months sadly the internet card must be having issues as it has days it won't connect to internet at all. Also after 7 months of proper care the battery only lasts about an hour an a half to two hours at the most... Now I am going to have to buy another laptop to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The device is very user friendly and lightweight. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The device is very user friendly and lightweight. The only problem I have found, which is very frustrating, is that the space bar doesn't always work. One really needs to get in the habit of intentionally striking the space bar.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: For the money, a decent "travel" computer or backup ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, a decent "travel" computer or backup. One very irritating problem is the space bar. Unless you hit it in a certain spot, it doesn't work. Several others have complained.
customer_reviews.author: R. Slater

customer_reviews.title: The product they're providing is actually white in color. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product they're providing is actually white in color. The white laptops are available elsewhere for 20$ less.They're falsely selling it under the guise of red laptops, complete misrepresentation. I now have to return a white laptop that I didn't ask for and am expected to pay for shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight, plenty of horsepower for browsing the web and working on documents. Love the battery life, usually get around 6-8 hours per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the basics I needed for 4 months. Then one day it simply would not charge and would not turn on. Literally the night before it was working fine, then the next afternoon it would not turn on. It is not a "cheap" lap top if it won't work for more than four months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little laptop. I used it for writing my reports at school and it did that fine. I don't believe it could be used for a lot more than that.
customer_reviews.author: JHawkins

customer_reviews.title: "Blue screen of death" warning
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about two weeks, then randomly got the "blue screen of death". I tried every troubleshooting option I could find and nothing worked. I was completely locked out. Apparently this is a pretty common problem. I didn't want to bother with trying to fix it, so I sent it back and ordered a new one. Hopefully this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: The size and color of the computer are great though, and it works for the size and ...
customer_reviews.text: The spacebar broke off within a week. Now I have a computer that works well otherwise...just no spacebar. It would cost half as much as the computer to fix that one bar. The size and color of the computer are great though, and it works for the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for home or office!
customer_reviews.text: It was the best gift I gave my husband for the holiday season. He had already transferred much to it and is thrilled about the size and weight taking it to business meetings almost everyday. He finds it to be an excellent product and is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Fran 5

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and does the job
customer_reviews.text: If your needing a basic laptop, this is for you. Purchased this for my son for research papers and school work. Works like a charm and does the job. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JudeandCo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but a few of the keys keeps sticking. If not it would've gotten more stars. Also it just stopped working one time, when it started working again the backspace and delete keys no longer worked. I take good care of my stuff but this tech is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: 8 months and it fried or something.
customer_reviews.text: 8 months and took a dump. The charging light comes on solid white and turns off. Will not respond with the power button at all. Very depressed over this.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Perez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The screen quality isn’t that great, but I bought it to hook up to my tv so it works perfect for movies and Netflix through hdmi Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my husband's old Dell and he loves it. In fact, I love it too. It has absolutely no clunky apps like my Acer does, so start up is a breeze. Light weight and perfect for all his browsing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this! Bought for international study abroad and travel. Three months later and I am back in states. No flaws so I will use it for my semester too. Was concerned with memory storage but not an issue. Downloaded my pics from phone then th flash drive. Best is the weight. I do not play video games. Watched films from YouTube and no issues. Highly recommended. Not a usual reviewer but wanted to comment on good product c
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Teeter

customer_reviews.title: Slow but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit slow, even for web browsing as you're sitting there waiting for pages like facebook, yahoo, youtube etc to load. but the size and the price make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: The best value I've ever gotten from a computer
customer_reviews.text: So light you will sometimes forget that it's in your bag. The best value I've ever gotten from a computer. So much better than lugging around a bulk laptop or spending a thousand bucks on an Air.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer. Not real fond of the color, so I am giving it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer - it was a gift but the recipient ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice computer - it was a gift but the recipient is very happy with it and loves the Red color - no problem finding his laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop it's cute and light weight I put 2,000 songs on it and it didn't even use half the memory it also has good picture quality and came in very fast
customer_reviews.author: Tryssa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I love it. Great chromebook alternative to run notepad and 3D printing software. 4 stars because unavailable in 4GB. Great quad core power though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Yap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great notebook on a great price. This is great for browsing and doing simple productive work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Laptop is very fashion. Nice and smooth. Easy to use. They have windows office 10 too for free. Fit with me and my style. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent minus the trackpad
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review. Horrible product. The battery is like the old MacBook Pro's and they battery expands when left on the charger. This causes buckling of the keyboard and the frame and makes it unsafe to use. DO NOT buy this product. I own mine for just under 2 years and this happens.. Bad on you Lenovo.. I know who will NOT be supplying my school district of 50,000 with chromebooks or laptops..
customer_reviews.author: GapperJay

customer_reviews.title: No charger Included
customer_reviews.text: The charger adapter was not included in the purchase. Unfortunately I assumed I was getting what I paid for and did not check the box before I left the country. Now the laptop is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not Linux Capable
customer_reviews.text: Can't install anything other than Windows on this machine; the BIOS is nerfed. If you're looking for a little Linux laptop, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rundle

customer_reviews.title: satisfied owner
customer_reviews.text: For its size it is just the best device for the money! It is faster than equipment I was using at the library. Cdd
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light laptop
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Screen Problem
customer_reviews.text: The screen on this laptop malfunctioned and stopped working properly only forty-five days after purchase. I expected much better product reliability from Lenovo, even in light of this being their low-end laptop. Don't make the same mistake I did and consider other buying options. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Great basic laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this laptop. It is small and light, ideal for taking all over and not having to carry a heavy computer! I wanted a basic computer for email, simple excel and word files as well as internet access. It does everything well. If you want something very fast look for a higher end laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lasala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price! Good product, my grand daughter is really enjoying this computer. Great first computer!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria..Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lenovo gets the job done. It's lightweight, fast enough and seemingly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop at exceptional price and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and I and both are enjoying them very much. Long battery life, good functions and nice display and weight make this a no-brainer for purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Live2Fish

customer_reviews.title: Recharge once every 5 days, amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lightweight pc, it does run hearthstone if you like light gaming, the battery is the best thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kool Aid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for occasionally working away from my office and for my personal needs.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy keyboard. Doesn't look cheap
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking this little baby. Light and handy. Easy keyboard. Doesn't look cheap. Perfect for coffee house working and transport back and forth to university.
customer_reviews.author: C. George

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! Not much space, and it has no disc drive, but that's to be expected!
customer_reviews.author: agent99

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport; works great
customer_reviews.text: Very light and has withstood quite a few drops despite feeling very fragile. I use it just for school and it works great and is really easy to take anywhere with me. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissla Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Functional for a non-touch screen tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Functional for Office users, not as convenient as an IPad touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 7 months and it still works perfectly! I would definitely recommend buying an sd card for extra storage space though!
customer_reviews.author: HO

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, everything I need in a simple laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, everything I need in a simple laptop, perfect for typing documents and browsing the Internet, good price for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Hoover

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific add on device
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific add on device. If you are primarily cloud based as I am, this is a really good terminal and more than that. My O365 was seamlessly integrated. Very lightweight and easy to travel with. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: excellent product purchase this as a gift for my Mom she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as presents for my 2 college bound sons. So far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is amazing for students who are looking for a basic laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is amazing for students who are looking for a basic laptop. I've had it for almost a year now and it's functioning just as good as when I first bought it. It's extremely lightweight and portable, comes with Windows 10, and is perfect for school work.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for campus use
customer_reviews.text: Great for campus use! I'm a commuter so this makes my commute a lot easier because of how light weight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Productresearch

customer_reviews.title: What a great computer and such a wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: What a great computer and such a wonderful price. Of course, have in mind this computer is a budget pc and you get even more for what you pay! Very worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Borjas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful laptop. Works great !!! Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful laptop. Light, Sleek, Works great !!! Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought for college purposes only, and it does exactly what it bought it for... only problem i've had is that due to so much little storage I could not install a windows 10 update
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great computer! Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is GREAT it is so light weight and easy to transport. it also runs at great speed and has decent graphics (im not a gamer) for my needs. It has an AMAZING battery life, i can leave it unplugged and connected to the wifi for DAYS and still have plenty of battery left when i pick it up to use it again. I love this computer and my other lenovos ive had in the past. Lenovo is a VERY durable brand as ive dropped mine one concrete and hardwood floors several times before finally managing to kill them. I will deff recommend this computer and all other lenovo products to everyone i know.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: A great team so far price value excellent relationship but a ...
customer_reviews.text: A great team so far price value excellent relationship but a single detail I miss in the sent a piece of the charger that goes to the wall I wrote them and they did not give me an answer
customer_reviews.author: Diego Salas

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. No English speaking support service. No US phone customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shomberg

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: Nice display, good speed, construction looks good, speakers not loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Delano A. Valek

customer_reviews.title: Travel companion
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and convenient for what I need. As a law student who is a busy body this is perfect for class, homework, research, travel etc. And it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: E O'Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for $150
customer_reviews.text: Its light, long battery life, small, and can do any basic function. Its useful for school but struggles to run more than a couple of programs at once. Worst part is that the touchpad can't zoom in, out, or scroll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The red color gives this lap top a wonderful appearance, but this is not a fast operating ...
customer_reviews.text: The red color gives this lap top a wonderful appearance, but this is not a fast operating lap top. Office 2016 doesn't work well with Windows 10 ( it freezes sometimes ) and internet sites are not open very fast. Time and date settings have problems ( the time changes unexpectedly ) so don't rely on this lap top time if you don't want to miss any appointment :) Beside these, is a practical lap top for using it for simple tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Edlira

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, except has problems awakening from sleep mode occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anton

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I really love it only has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I really love it only has a problem and that's its mouse it is kind of slow other than get this and enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The package was delivered in time and in good conditions. The product is working perfectly and so ...
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered in time and in good conditions. The product is working perfectly and so far I did not have any problem. Ideapad is a good cost-benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, spacebar sticks
customer_reviews.text: Great, does what I need. Only thing is that the spacebar sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than 6 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and this came recommended from several sources as one of the top budget laptops. While it worked, it was great - met all my expectations. No, you can't have tons of programs or internet tabs open at once, and at this price you shouldn't expect to. However, after less than 6 months it no longer turns on. This is outside of the 1 month return timeframe, so my next step will be to contact Lenovo to see if they can help. Will update my review when I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! Size is just right for my daughter! She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For internet surfing or ms office doc.....that is enough. No Complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty slow! What can you expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty slow! What can you expect for the price? I only needed it for web browsing/school, the basics. Not mass media. It wasn't built for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this laptop and only a month of use ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this laptop and only a month of use it already got broken and I am not allowed to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great portable laptop for the price. I had to get a second one, as someone sat on mine and broke it. Still, best choice around for price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life and it's very light and portable
customer_reviews.text: Decent sub $200 windows computer. I needed a windows based computer to run certain old software that my Chromebook couldn't run. It's adequate for a computer with 2gb of RAM. Very slow on the interwebz and the touchpad blows every chimpanzee in the primate house. Excellent battery life and it's very light and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Moishlashen

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 8th grader. It is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: k.narasaki
